name: CavesOfNot (GameAWeek)
description:
CavesOfNot is my third game for the GameAWeek challenge after coming back from holidays; this time with the letter C (inspired by the awesome game CavesOfQud).

As per the challenge name, this game was made by me in a week with the letter C as the only prompt. I relied heavily on the tcod tutorial in python (here) and the c# adapted tutorial by @thesleepykoala (here). It is by no means a finished product, hence the prototype status tag.

Enjoy!

CONTROLS:

  • ARROWS: move the player
  • ESCAPE: toggle the escape/pause menu (load, save and quit)
  • I: toggle the inventory/use window
  • D: toggle the drop window
  • G: pick item on the floor, if any
  • ENTER: take the stairs OR confirm action if a menu is shown (escape, use, drop, level-up)
  • C: toggle character information window (lvl, xp, attack, defense)
  • V: toggle message history window

CONTENT:

  • 2 MONSTERS: orc and troll
  • 4 CONSUMABLES: potions and scrolls
  • 4 EQUIPABLES: two weapons and two armors
